Name: Indexed Customer only
Expression: {FILTER(TM1FILTERBYLEVEL(TM1SUBSETALL([SLS_CUSTOMER]) , 0) , ((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Sales Group Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Sales Group])))) AND ((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Indexed Customer] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[zIndexed_Customer])))))}
